Disaster and Society.
Course Description:
This course focuses the social aspect of disasters. It introduces students to many topics related how disasters shape societies and cultures and how individuals, groups, organizations, and states respond to disasters. Readings, documentaries, and various cultural objects, such as literature, movies, fine arts, and music, are utilized to facilitate lectures and discussions.
